name: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit: Escape the Undead City HD
name_original: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit: Escape the Undead City HD
description: Battle through 36 levels of Zombie Apocalypse horror! Which is better - shotgun, pistol or AK-47? Blast their rotten, infected brains out and choose your favorite! Scavenge weapons and armor to pimp out your souped up zombie slaying car - then plow down the man-eating hordes to Escape the Undead City, and try not to get your guts torn out!!!
